synopsis.text: Ichirou Umoregi, a prodigious boy known as 'Akuma-kun,' emerges once every ten thousand years with demonic powers and unparalleled intellect. Raised by demons, he partners with Mephisto III, a half-human entity, to investigate mysterious cases and unravel the enigma of his own origin. Set three decades after the original 1989 anime series, this alternate story follows Akuma-kun's adventures as a paranormal investigator, solving murders and unveiling dark secrets. Meanwhile, unsuspecting office worker Sato is coerced into tutoring Ichirou Matsushita, his boss's son, in exchange for career advancement. Little does he know that his new pupil is the infamous Akuma-kun, who transforms him into a demonic servant and enlists his aid in opening a portal to hell to execute a sinister world domination plan. As Sato navigates this terrifying new reality, he discovers that his predecessor vanished without a trace, leaving him to question his own fate. Delve into the chilling world of Akuma-kun, where supernatural mysteries and diabolical schemes intertwine to create a thrilling and suspenseful tale.
